Close() - Method in class Executable.Archivo
Método que cierra el archivo para que otro programa lo pueda usar
Close(boolean) - Method in class Executable.Archivo
Método que cierra el archivo para que otro programa lo pueda usar, Si el random access file esta en nulo no es necesario cerrarlo porque nunca fue abierto, y en ese sentido para este método es algo bueno porque se supone que se cierra para no mantenerlo vinculado y si nunca fue vinculado mucho mejor

Connect() - Method in class Clients.OnLineTool.OpServerConnection
This method try to connect with the opserver, if is unable to connect with opserver then the online variable is set false, else is true

CorbaStatus - Class in Clients.OffLineTool
This class display the corba status, to do that, just try to get the list of initilized services, if its possible to retrieve this list, then Corba is up, else corba could be on error or Unknown.
CorbaStatus(AdvancedComponentClient) - Constructor for class Clients.OffLineTool.CorbaStatus
This is the constructor of CorbaStatus, and just initialize the AdvancedComponentClient from ACSClient

This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
CorbaStatus(AdvancedComponentClient) - Constructor for class Clients.OnLineTool.CorbaStatus
 
createFile(String) - Static method in class Executable.WebOMCLauncher
This method create the file on case of this files was not found, like another methods, here i'm executing a bash command line (touch $AXIS2_HOME/WebOMCFiles/cacheFile) to create the file and later be able to write on it.
createOffLineClients() - Method in class Executable.Publisher
Here initialize the list of OffLine clients that will display all online information from making corba calls.
createOnLineClients() - Method in class Executable.Publisher
Here initialize the list of OnLine clients that will display all online information from opserver This will display the following information : - ACSStatus - AlmaStatus - AntennaStatus - ContainerStatus - SubsystemsStatus
